title: Crypto Is Dead.
detailed_content: I’ve been in crypto for years now, I saw it all — the highs, the lows, and the memes. I worked as a designer for two crypto startups in 2022 and even became a journalist for Forbes. I’ve been invited to attend to multiple crypto conferences all over the world including New York, Paris, and Switzerland.Last year, I even had the opportunity to speak at an event in Davos during the World Economic Forum. The same event where former…
author: Derick David
